ul.li: Login to the TMS system using your corporate user Id

step.cmd: From the Quick Links section select “Select a Test Case”

info.p: Click on the "Select a Test Case" in order to go to the test case form.

step.cmd: Click on the Test Case Id of the test case you wish to view

info.p: To view the information pertaining to a specific test case click on the test case id.

result.p: The details of that test case will display on the screen
